description:
Kiyoshi`s Pancham lives with his trainer Kiyoshi in a town near Shala City. Rocket Gang dressed up as Ash Ketchum and his friends in order to discredit them. They forced a battle on Kiyoshi and Kiyoshi`s Pancham who didn`t want to battle. Kiyoshi`s Pancham was injured from the battle and Kiyoshi told them he`d report them to Officer Jenny.
Since it doesn`t battle, none of its moves are known.
name: Yancham (Kiyoshi)
